io.github.rowak

Class Effect.Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.Effect.Color
  • Enclosing class:
    Effect

    public static class Effect.Color
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single color in an effect's palette. Used to store JSON-parsed data.

      Color()

        public static Effect.Color fromHSB(int hue,
                                   int saturation,
                                   int brightness)
        Creates an HSB instance of Color without probability.
        Parameters:
        hue - the hue of the color
        saturation - the saturation of the color
        brightness - the brightness of the color
        Returns:
        a new Color

      • fromHSB

        public static Effect.Color fromHSB(int hue,
                                   int saturation,
                                   int brightness,
                                   double probability)
        Creates an HSB instance of Color with probability.
        Parameters:
        hue - the hue of the color
        saturation - the saturation of the color
        brightness - the brightness of the color
        probability - the probability of the color appearing in the effect
        Returns:
        a new Color

      • fromRGB

        public static Effect.Color fromRGB(int red,
                                   int green,
                                   int blue)
        Creates an RGB instance of Color without probability.
        Parameters:
        red - the red RGB value of the desired color
        green - the green RGB value of the desired color
        blue - the blue RGB value of the desired color
        Returns:
        a new Color
